name: Dig
description: The Kubrow digs up ammunition and health orbs

name: Ferocity
description: Enables finisher attacks and increases finisher damage of the Kubrow

name: Howl
description: The Kubrow strikes fear into enemies

name: Mecha Overdrive
description: Increases Kubrow status chance based on the total status chance of the player's primary weapon

name: Neutralize
description: Bites the hand of an enemy causing them to drop their weapon

name: Proboscis
description: Allows the Helminth to grapple and drag enemies

name: Protect
description: The Kubrow automatically restores some of its owner's shields when they are not at full capacity

name: Retrieve
description: The Kubrow sniffs out loot hidden in crates and dropped by enemies retrieving these items for its master

name: Savagery
description: Enables finisher attacks and increases finisher damage of the Kubrow

name: Stalk
description: The Kubrow cloaks its owner when enemies are close

name: Strain Eruption
description: Maggots spawned by the Helminth explode on death dealing Corrosive damage based on a percentage of an enemy's health

name: Strain Fever
description: Increases the damage of the Helminth per Cyst

name: Trample
description: Allows the Helminth to tackle an enemy
